snippet.title: Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory - Xbox Gameplay (Xbox One Re-Release)
snippet.description:
The Foreseen Arcade's first upload of an original Xbox game, backward compatible on Xbox One.

Released exclusively in PAL regions, Shoot your way through 18 missions in three different campaigns. Experience the Blitz as a Prussian officer, defend your country as a Russian Tank Commander or march right through Berlin as an Allied Commander. Though keep in mind that unlike the Gold Edition on Steam or GOG, the console version doesn't have the Dunes of War expansion, mainly that came out a year after the game's release and the original Xbox was discontinued the same year as Fields of Glory.

The game does have multiplayer, but only via LAN, since Xbox Live on the OG Xbox was shut down years ago.

Panzer Elite Action: Fields of Glory (C) THQ Nordic
Originally published by JoWood Productions and Deep Silver
Developed by Zootfly
Also available on PC and PlayStation 2

#panzereliteaction #xbox #xbox2001 #originalxbox #xboxoriginal #ogxbox #retrogames #retrogaming #xboxonebackwardcompatibility #backwardcompatibility #thqnordic #jowood
